Welcome.preMessage: Hey, welcome back to the village!! Now press 'Ok' and go speak to the other villagers.

The arrow.preMessage: Wow!! That colored scarf!! That's great news, you must inform the chief of the village!! The arrow on top of the screen will guide you to him.

Initial story.preMessage: Oh!! I couldn't believe it until I saw it!  Wait... it must be a sign... go to the South and speak to the Old Man, he will explain everything to you.

The prophecy.preMessage: A coloured scarf?! What a unique event!! Now I'll tell you a story. In this world there have always been two races: the Trilight, and the Klamers. But the Klamers betrayed us long ago.

First enemy.preMessage: Waaaa!! An enemy spider, watch out!! You can't fight enemies at the moment, so just run!! Keep on going South to the Sanctuary

Sanctuary gate.preMessage: Here you are. This is the Green Sanctuary gate. As far as I know, nobody has entered there since the Old Times.

Village under attack.preMessage: Thank goodness you're back!! Enemies are coming from the West and are attacking our people!! Go and help the villagers!!

Using spells.preMessage: You'll have to use your new spell!! Cast it against the enemies!!

Kill heavy spider.preMessage: Spiders are attacking us!! Kill the big one North of our house!!

Coloring.preMessage: Thanks a lot for helping us!! Do you know that you can recover health by coloring an object and staying near it? Now try to color our house.

To the forest.preMessage: As you just saw enemies can be very dangerous. I think you should go to the forest and find where they're coming from. Do you see that the house lost its colour again? Always remember that the enemy feeds off color!!

To the boss.preMessage: This place is full of spiders, watch out!!

The boss.preMessage: Beyond that spider web, you'll find the Queen of all spiders. You should prepare for combat. Be careful.

To the new world.preMessage: YOU KILLED IT!! Thanks very much. I knew I could rely on you. I think now you should begin your journey to the other regions of this world, in order to free all the other colors.

Welcome to the north.preMessage: No way, Colors?! My cousin in the green world told me about this. Go to the sanctuary, our rangers are waiting for you.

Ice Rangers.preMessage: Hey get out of here, here is dangerous. Oh wait that scarf?! I guess you're the new one of the GreenLand. We are the Ice Rangers. Try to find out what's going on in the Old Forest.

Back alive.preMessage: What? You found a Crystal? For the Black and White!! Anyway there's no time to waste. Head to the East Ranger, he says weird sounds have come out from the old timberland

Learn Cyan.preMessage: Cast Cyan. Combining spells will give you more power, it is the only way of getting out of here!!!

Up the road.preMessage: Hi there, you're the Color Bringer right? Well, at least that´s how the Klamers refer to you. Please check what's going on down this road.

BossFightTitan.preMessage: Watchout!!!! The ancient frozen titan is here!!!!

Titan Slayer.preMessage: You killed the old frozen titan?!? For the grace of the colors you are the chosen one! Go North and continue your path young hero

The Last Goodbye.preMessage: Keep going, I think they might need you in other places...

Red World.postMessage: Welcome to Red World. The Red Sanctuary is closed by a lock. Search for the keys
